Author: joshwa
Content:
See the reddit discussion of this same article-- commenters point out that this is due to TOS violations, i.e. ripping the ad content out of the google iframe and putting it statically on the page. So google can't tell that it's indexing adwords content.

http://reddit.com/info/1vczh/comments

http://reddit.com/info/1vczh/comments/c1vezw
